name: Pioneer Press on GitHub
tagline: St. Paul Pioneer Press, Minnesota's first newspaper and winner of three Pulitzers, can be found online at www.TwinCities.com
body:
### Who we are
The Pioneer Press, a Media News Group newspaper and the winner of three Pulitzer Prizes, serves readers and advertisers in the Twin Cities’ East Metro region and Western Wisconsin. The newspaper also is available at more than 1,300 West Metro and Minneapolis locations, including newspaper boxes and retail store newsstands. The Pioneer Press – with its familiar bulldog brand – reflects the excellent journalism, distinctive personalities and tenacious, loyal and dependable spirit readers and advertisers find in Minnesota’s First Newspaper. Visit us at: `http://www.twincities.com/`

### How to reach us
To contact us by phone, call 651-717-7377 for customer service; 651-228-5490 for the newsroom.

### Where to find us
Print newspaper, online news Web site, niche products

### Phone
(651) 222-1111
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
